chart_description: This chart displays the amount of logical reads on the disk, in KiB/s, for each user on the system.

dimension_descriptions.1000: Logical reads in KiB/s for user with user ID 1000.
dimension_descriptions.1001: Logical reads in KiB/s for user with user ID 1001.
dimension_descriptions.65532: Logical reads in KiB/s for user with user ID 65532.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: Logical reads in KiB/s for the Netdata daemon.
dimension_descriptions.nobody: Logical reads in KiB/s for the 'nobody' user.
dimension_descriptions.nut: Logical reads in KiB/s for the Network UPS Tools user.
dimension_descriptions.root: Logical reads in KiB/s for the root user.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-coredump: Logical reads in KiB/s for the systemd-coredump system service.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-network: Logical reads in KiB/s for the systemd-network system service.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-timesync: Logical reads in KiB/s for the systemd-timesyncd system service.
dimension_descriptions.vpopmail: Logical reads in KiB/s for the vpopmail user.
dimension_descriptions.xfs: Logical reads in KiB/s for the XFS file system.
